name: Deadline!
overview: An AMOS based freeware game created by Shadow Software (Aaron Fothergill) in 1991. In the game, you control Arnold Shortscribbler, who is trying to write an article for the next AMOS newsletter. Unfortunately, he has only a limited amount of time to collect together all his AMOS P.D. collection to allow him to write the article. Arnold must avoid muggers, rottweilers , pit bulls, water and an occasional mutant pigeon while gathering his collection. Use spades to trap baddies, use stop signs to stop muggers.
